snippet.textDisplay:
I remember when I was growing up, I would get annoyed hearing the voices of performers I thought were in too many games. My god, now if I hear someone in everything I‚Äôm just glad they get to eat

Also, I was not expecting you to bring up Sekiro, really glad to hear him talk about that one, even as quiet as he was. A man never expecting to be treated as anything more than a tool. Can absolutely see struggling with how little emotion he shows in that game.
snippet.textOriginal:
I remember when I was growing up, I would get annoyed hearing the voices of performers I thought were in too many games. My god, now if I hear someone in everything I‚Äôm just glad they get to eat

Also, I was not expecting you to bring up Sekiro, really glad to hear him talk about that one, even as quiet as he was. A man never expecting to be treated as anything more than a tool. Can absolutely see struggling with how little emotion he shows in that game.
